website_summaries.verdict: For those who prefer their braces with copper, this is an unparalleled option boasting high copper content.
pros: Lightweight and extremely comfortable to wear, even in warmer weather
Nylon and spandex blend offers excellent moisture-wicking performance
Infused with high levels of the best-quality copper
Easy to wash, and it dries faster than others
cons: The overall compression isn't the highest, and these sleeves may be more prone to stretching out

website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you are looking for high-performing compression, but the claims of the benefits of the copper infusion are questionable.
pros: A popular model that offers comfortable, precise compression
Comes with a money back guarantee
cons: Some users comment that while the compression is good, the copper infusion didn't seem to have any additional effect

customer_reviews.title: Don’t look anywhere else this is the product!
customer_reviews.text: Initially wrong size was sent, copper compression contacted me direct and sent out the correct six’s ASAP. This company is all about the customer which I feel some companies just want your money. Well this is a company that goes above and beyond. As for the compression sleeve it’s one of the best I have tried and I have tried a few of the main brands. I recently developed tennis elbow and this brace Alleviates the pain in my elbow withining a half hour of putting it on. This is a home run! Thank you again Copper Compression
customer_reviews.author: Topsoil

customer_reviews.title: Elbow Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I bought the elbow sleeve to ease my tendon pain. I thought I ordered the correct size but I must not have. I realized it was too tight and contacted the company. OMG !!! I was told to keep and share the original and that the larger size was on the way at no cost. Now I have 3 of their products and I will recommend to everyone. Great products and even better customer care.
customer_reviews.author: Service Tech

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am so impressed by this compression sleeve! I bought this for elbow tendonitis and arthritis and I can not be happier with my purchase!! I use to wake up in pain but, now I sleep with this sleeve on and it has helped me tremendously. I no longer feel as much pain and feel my elbow is supported so well with this sleeve! So happy with this purchase and I definitely will buy again....probably very soon as I need one for my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Leenie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding elbow sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I have off and on bouts of golf/tennis elbow. I've tried a variety of support devices. To date they were marginal in their support and relief from pain. I decided to give the Copper Compression elbow sleeve a try. I am very pleased with the results. It fits comfortably snug, provides excellent support, and most importantly, I've been able to play both tennis and golf pain free. I wear it for periods of time when not participating in sport activities. It appears to be aiding in the healing of my strained elbow tendons and arm muscles. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: They are the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Have used the compression sleeves for both elbow (tennis elbow) and knee. They relieved the pain and discomfort and I can play tennis, bowling, and softball with no problems. They are the best on the market. So satisfied with the results and quality of the product, I recommended Copper Compression to fellow tennis players as well as softball players and bowlers. The results for them was fantastic, and I was really pleased that I could help introduce your products to them. I also have a Compression tee-Shirt which also alleviates back and shoulder discomfort. Helps keep me on the field, love your sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Blueblazr

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The Copper Compression elbow sleeves has alleviated my elbow pain during weight training. Customer service is great and helped me exchange my my sleeve for a larger sleeve quickly. I'm a 5'8" male and the medium sleeve was to tight, the large fits perfect. I was really impressed with the product and customer service that I bought another sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: lpac

customer_reviews.title: Like magic!
customer_reviews.text: This elbow sleeve is like magic! I've had problems with my elbows & shoulders for years. Steroid injections, NSAID anti-inflammatory pills, PRP injections, all sorts of treatments have failed me. This simple compression sleeve has reduced my elbow pain nearly entirely. I am happily surprised at how well this works. I highly recommend this product to anyone with arthritis, tendinitis, or any type of elbow pain.
customer_reviews.author: the Archangel

customer_reviews.title: perfect to help push past the pain
customer_reviews.text: These were very helpful with the pain. During the workout it made the pain very minimal however after you take them off and the blood starts flowing freely then the pain will probably come back. Also it will not stay in place but that is because during workouts your arms are growing and shrinking with the muscle movements so you will have to adjust them but that's not the products fault. You absolutely need to wash them after your workout, I just clean them in cold water with soap and then air dry.
customer_reviews.author: jbatman

customer_reviews.title: You will feel Really ripped off when you see the product
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of shocked at how cheap the product looked. It didnt even come close to fitting either. I figure the product must have cost around .13 cents to produce with about the same for the packaging and literature. The literature was all about how I could get great discounts on their garbage if I ordered more. Most rip offs are bigger. This one is slick.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: I over stressed my elbow by lifting too much on lateral and front raises. Not being in a position where I can slow down, I needed something to help with the recovery while I'm active. This seems to be working well for me. I usually wear it all day and take it off at night. I've washed it according to the instructions on the sleeve and it's always come out looking new. I did notice a smell when I first removed it from the package, but that went away very quickly. Overall I'm satisfied with it and may order another for my other arm.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just open the product today and it looks like somebody is already been using it . The littering is falling off, it's too tight and there is absolutely no support I feel like I wasted my money because I got more support from the generic velcro brace that I got from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is a thin piece of garbage that does absolutely nothing. I do not understand how anyone can give this product a good review. It is a gimmick. This is made in CHINA and is junk. Buy a good one made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: lrchops

customer_reviews.title: Based on their size chart I am a PERFECT size large
customer_reviews.text: Based on their size chart I am a PERFECT size large. The first few days it fit well and felt great after that it started to stretch out to the point that I had to keep pulling it up. I washed and dried it on the delicate setting and when first re-applied it felt like new again. Now, only after wearing it for an hour or two its stretched back out again. I emailed the company because they ask for 100% customer satisfaction and never heard back from them. I also left the seller feedback through the Amazon website and never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two weeks. CC won't reply to emails.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed by the quality of your elbow copper compression support. After only a week of use the lettering began to peel off of the fitting. At two weeks the threads have started to come out as well. I've been extremely careful and it's never been in the washer and the few times it was washed, it was in cold water and allowed to air dry. I have owned a dash pro elbow compression support and it is approximately 3 months old and is in better condition. I have sent CC three emails and they won't reply.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Books!!!

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Complete wastw of money. Twrrible quality. I pulled this up my arm from the thick upper band and teared off
customer_reviews.author: Art Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves works great. I gave two stars because it’s poorly made. It’s has a hole in it after two weeks of use and the letters are peeling. This product hasn’t even been washed yet and already Deteriorating. Update! Company corrected the issue and quickly sent a new one with better results.
customer_reviews.author: C. Broaddus

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a piece of garbage! Nothing more then a spandex sleeve. It tore putting it on for first time. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JeffN

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. Do your research before you buy to make sure it is right for you!
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports says this about all copper+compression products: [...]. That aside, this product provides light compression on your elbow joints. What is light compression? It's like someone's is gripping your elbow joint while you do Yoga, some pushups, or run. Make sure you buy TWO of these if you have issues with both arms. Follow the sizing chart. My tendinitis was the result of too many pushups and pullups and yoga without appropriate rest over a long duration. So far these things do help reduce the amount of pain I feel while doing yoga. I'm off to pushups tomorrow, hopefully it will be a productive day.
customer_reviews.author: KenB

customer_reviews.title: Tight but it works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small elbow sleeve according to the size measurement chart and when it first came I thought it was too small but rechecked the chart and saw that if you're between sizes like I am order the smaller one as it's the tightness that makes it work. So I've been wearing it and have gotten used to the feel and it really is helping heal my tennis elbow. Plus the copper in it is great for joints that are getting some arthritis. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this did not aid in healing
customer_reviews.text: My husband has not noticed any improvement after wearing this regualry for three weeks. I believe in the power of copper amd compression which is why I purchased this for him, despite some of the reviews, but he recently bought a ‘tennis elbow’ relief strap from cvs and has had relief, so I dont know that id recommend this, but it may depend on the injury and demand put on the area. My husband is a home builder and craftsman, so unfortunately depends heavily on this joint, in arms especially. Perhaps for people with minor ailments and whom are less active in upper body it may provide more relief.
customer_reviews.author: CASS C

customer_reviews.title: To big. Size chart not accurate. Have not heard back from the message I sent to seller. :(
customer_reviews.text: I would of given 5 stars across the board... but, the sizing is off on their sizing chart. I measured where they said to and ordered that size. It's to big. I can tell that if it were tighter that the compression would be wonderful. I doubled it over which made it somewhat tighter but then obviously it is only 1/2 as long. I messaged the seller but am yet to hear back. I suggest you order a size smaller then what your think you would need if you want to be able to feel the compression.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is innacurate
customer_reviews.text: Sizing chart is very inaccurate relative to what I received. Ordered an XL size and the sleeve is so tight its uncomfortable instead of improving comfort. I lift weights and have bigger arms than average, but the size is still misleading. Hardley fits past my elbow without cutting off circulation. Wondering if the one I received is mismarked(?)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Mackie

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Compression elbow sleeve works well. I have that tennis elbow from over straining my arm. The sleeve helps a lot with the pain. It is not a cure. It just helps with the range of motion and the use of my arm at work. Again, not a cure. Just a temporary fix. My tennis elbow does not hurt near as much. The healing process takes a while, this my help. The sleeve itself is light weight and thin. Fits well. Is comfortable. I can wear mine all day and all night. I find this product useful for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my elbow burstitis
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had elbow bursitis. It was a weird bump that stuck way out and you could really see it when compared to my other elbow. After using this for a couple weeks, the swelling on my elbow went down significantly. The compression for medium sized seemed a bit much for myself, being a little on the small side, at first, but was comfortable after a couple days. After the first week, it actually started feeling good. Not sure if the copper content helped at all but the compression itself was beneficial for the bursitis. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless and the edges irritate arms
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve did not help at all. On top of it, I could not wear it for longer than a couple of hours, as the stitching at folded edges irritated my arms. I tried wearing it inside out - this time the seams irritated. An insert that came with the product said it has 100% satisfaction warranty, but ONLY if I register. This is a joke - according to The Federal Trade Commission, products that come with "full" warranty (which is what 100% warranty implies) cannot require registration! This one is going back
customer_reviews.author: kayceefan2000

customer_reviews.title: Order next size up even if u measured.
customer_reviews.text: I first rerurned this bc it was to small and seemed like it had been used already and the white letters fall off pretty easily but thats not a huge deal to me.but it seemed wasier to just return it so i did...then i unexpectedly recieved an email from customer support of the company. asking why i had returned it etc. I told them this and they apologized for everything etc.offered send me a new one in the right size for free.which was pretty amazing.they didnt want me to walk away from thier brand over a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very very small
customer_reviews.text: Make you you get one size bigger than what you think you need or even two as this was extremely small on me. i gave them to a friend of mine whos arm are smaller than mine and they were small on him as well, he is 5 ft 10 about 135lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Tennis Elbow!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my physician daughter-in-law. I'm recovering from severe tennis elbow and required the support of a compression sleeve. I really like this sleeve for my upper and lower arm - compression is not so much as to be uncomfortable, but does have very good firmness. My only complaint is that my upper arms are a bit meaty and if I pull the sleeve too high, it tends to roll over and becomes uncomfortable - have to keep the upper sleeve lower on my arm which is fine since I'm treating the elbow!
customer_reviews.author: Dixiegalwannabe

customer_reviews.title: Kept sliding down my arm.
customer_reviews.text: These arm wraps constantly had to be pulled back up my arm as they kept sliding down during the day. Not a miracle product. Did not really relieve my pain as it claimed it would. Wasn’t really expecting my pain to go away overnight but was expecting a different experience using these copper sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Copper Compression Is The Truth !!!
customer_reviews.text: First, Let Me Start By Saying, This Sleeve Is The Best Hands Down !!! Second, Yes The Words " Copper Compression " Will Start To Pull Off As You Continue To Wear It. Its A Very Small Inconvenience, But No Biggie. Third, The Customer Service ( The Company Not Amazon ) Is Hands Down The Best On Amazon. I Ordered A XX-Large And It Wasn't Snug Enough, So Copper Compression Sent Me A X-Large For FREE !!!! Fourth, Unless Your A Worlds Strongman Winner, Don't Get XX-Large. The X-Large Is Better, With A Nice Snug Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Odin

customer_reviews.title: Functional elbow sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I have a swollen bursa that has been a problem for about one year. Since I started using this elbow sleeve my bursa has shrunk to about 1/2 size. This sleeve is much less irritating than the compression sleeve I was using. It was very tight when I received it but it fits perfectly now. I am so impressed I'm going to get a knee sleeve from the same company. This elbow sleeve is comfy to wear and seems to be helping me solve my bursa problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morning

customer_reviews.title: Infected Elbow Bursa
customer_reviews.text: I had an infected bursa on my elbow. Very large. After treatment from my doctor with antibiotics and an antiinflammatory. The pain and swelling went down by about 20%. I then started to use this sleeve. I wear it all day and night except while bathing. My elbow is almost 100% better after 2 weeks of wearing this product. I purchased another one for my other elbow for support during weight training. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do a thing in helping my recovery from tennis elbow. I didn't expect any support from something so flimsy and it does provide support but I did expect it to speed up the recovery because of th "copper" effects. Waste of money. updated my review from 1 star to 2 because of the great customer service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Copper fit sleeves have always worked for me. More so than just compression alone
customer_reviews.text: I have the knee and now the elbow sleeve. Both work great for reliving swelling from joint pain. I’ve had some real bad tennis elbow after hitting my funny bone on a rail. Pain has lasted a couple weeks and has gotten worse when using too much of forearm. Bought this and wore it for 3 days straight including sleeping in it. Also kept my arm straight as much as possible. The swelling and pain is now gone and I’m back at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with...seemed to work?
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended a copper infused strap for my tennis elbow. I took a look at these and liked the price. I ordered two; one to wear while I was working out and the other to wear at work. The ones I first ordered were far too small and tore immediately. I contacted the company and they responded quickly, sending me two new ones in the correct size. I wore the straps for several weeks and my elbow does feel better. Was it the straps or my physical therapy? I'm not sure but my elbow definitely feels better and dealing with Copper Compression was super easy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Busterkilrain

customer_reviews.title: As described, but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended that I get a copper-infused sleeve for golfer's elbow. I have a large arm so I got 2x. It fit snugly but correctly. It is warm and seems to be helping. The durability is not so great, though. I've only worn it a couple of weeks and have not yet washed it, and the logo has already peeled off and some of the stitching around the elastic and the top has come off. Seems like it should last longer than this. The fit and support is good, though.
customer_reviews.author: G. Akuji

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable to wear and since I started wearing it last ...
customer_reviews.text: After developing "tennis elbow' from lifting weights, I did a little research, and then purchased the Copper Compression Elbow Sleeve. The second I put it on I felt instant relief. The muscle soreness immediately went down to a manageable level. It's comfortable to wear and since I started wearing it last week, I already feel better. So it's safe to say that products such as this can promote muscle healing. Of course I'm using it in conjunction with rest and ice packs. Another thing I like is that the sleeve is snug, but not too tight on my skin. Good circulation is obviously a critical component of the healing process.
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Compression Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable compression sleeve made with quality material. I got the medium and the fit is perfect. I am 140 lbs and 5'2". I highly recommend this compression sleeve if you have problems with tendinitis in your elbow.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lawecki

customer_reviews.title: two different sizes, products, packaging
customer_reviews.text: one sleeve fit the second was a good 1/4 inch smaller at the wide end fold than the first...different material composition, different logo color, packaging, size location differed: essentially I considered the one to be a knock off; it got three stars for the order for that reason. I wrote directly to the company itemizing my observations and got a very prompt reply. If I get my order corrected by them as promised, I would give them a better rating, so hold onto your hats while I do just that,
customer_reviews.author: Joe Book

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I work in the produce department of a major grocer, mostly 'breaking down the truck'. Most days, I'm arranging 40- to 50-pound boxes in our coolers, which involves a lot of physical work. Before wearing the elbow sleeve, I noticed a repetitive stress injury begin to rear its ugly head in my right forearm. Well, this baby did the trick! When I'm working, I no longer feel any pain in that area, and I can throw boxes all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!!! So this did not work for us AT ALL!! We did not enjoy it. The fit wasn't great either. It was just a cheap piece of material. We decided to send it back for a refund and they only gave a partial refund....deducting a "restocking fee"....This has never happened to us on Amazon. We are disgusted that a cheaply made item would be sold for this price and not work for us and then be denied our full refund!!
customer_reviews.author: HM12006

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I take care of my possessions and the first Copper Compression Recovery Elbow Sleeve that I bough tore/gave way easily as I pulled it up my arm. Silly me, I bought a 2nd one from them and justified the 2nd purchase by promissing myself that I would be more careful in handling it. Despite careful handling, the upper hel, has also started tearing away from the sleeve. In addition, it tends to begin sliding down the arm after 10 days to 2 weeks of use. Note: Made in (h!n@
customer_reviews.author: caughtintime

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: OVERVIEW: I bought this product after I began to get develop tendinitis in my elbows. I play Frisbee, tennis, football and lift weights so I put a large amount of stress on my elbow on a day to day basis. Began experiencing pain after while playing and lifting and bought this product to help. I now wear it whenever I am doing anything that will stress my elbow. Definitely reduces the strain put on the elbow and keeps you from aggravating the injury. FIT: The fit chart worked great for me. I measured right at the top of the large range and the fit is perfect, just enough compression to provide the protection needed.
customer_reviews.author: William Chann

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous to purchase but happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I measured first and was hopeful a medium would fit well and not be too tight. I have horrible gardeners elbow right now and I am wearing it as I type. It was TIGHT when I first put on but I realized I probably didnt need it that high up the arm so I pulled down a bit. No clue what the copper does but I am getting relief in my elbow with the sturdiness of the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Read my review for more info.
customer_reviews.text: I had to do a 4* simply due to the size being too tight. I couldn’t do any other star review on the range of motion, comfort, or pain relief because lack of size. Not sure if arm “grew” because of gym visits but anyway, 4*. I highly recommend adding +1 to the size; if you measure 12”, go by 13” instead. The material is... slightly stiff; perhaps that’s why my measurements were “inaccurate”.
customer_reviews.author: P.E.

customer_reviews.title: 95% pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have severe tendonitis and upon applying this sleeve on my arm, after about 5 hours I noticed the pain subsided. It isn't fully gone, but makes the day far less painless. To get it to fully heal will most likely require some massage therapy and using the arm a bit less so the inflamed tendons and seized muscles will recover. In the meantime, it's making me more functional without having to take pain relievers around the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk. A waste of your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: It's one leg of some yoga pants with elastic on the top. An extremely cheap, low-quality product. Every letter fell off of it the FIRST TIME I put it on, meaning I can't send it back. This thing is complete garbage, and I'm blown away by these exaggerated positive comments. Mine was $16. There's no way this thing should be sold for more than $5. It's a ripoff at anything 5. It's pretty much a tube sock with the end cut off.
customer_reviews.author: BBryan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: I cannot fairly review any aspect of this sleeve other than sizing. I order size Large from Tommie Copper and they fit very well. I ordered the size Large for this one, it's quite a bit smaller than the ones I get from Tommie. I haven't worn it much because it's too tight, so can't evaluate any other aspects of the sleeve. I recommend that you order one size up from what you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands behinds it’s quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still getting a feel for this product in terms of total effect in a workout environment. Definitely relieves the stress on the injured bicep, and reduces pain. But what is really outstanding is the company behind the product. I had a problem with the first one ordered, which was the lettering falling off when I put it on my body for the first time. The customer service department replaced it with no questions and have followed up to make certain that I was satisfied. The new one I received clearly shows that the first had a defect that is not indicative of the company’s quality. I am going to be buying more products from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: S. W. TX

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Investment
customer_reviews.text: What a worthwhile investment! I’m very pleased with the investment of this arm compression, as it’s been invaluable to my wife’s work routine. She is constantly moving her arms in her line of work, whereby this compression has stabilized her arm. Before the compression, she was experiencing arm pain; however, with this amazing compression, she’s eliminated the pain in her arm.
customer_reviews.author: Franz B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love playing golf but I have struggled with bursitis in my right elbow. I purchased the Copper elbow sleeve and wore it for 3 consecutive days in a tournament the first weekend. The fit, quality, and support were surprising and I and my elbow really appreciated it. I really enjoy this product and it comes at a very affordable price. Try it, can't hurt and only help.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: sleeve not well made
customer_reviews.text: At first it looks ok. within a few weeks it begins to get stretched out. Finally the metalic fibers begin to break and come through the fabric. Not sure if the fibers are even copper, and then it is useless. They claim it is guaranteed, but there is no contact information for making a request. "100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - In the very unlikely event that you do not absolutely Love this Copper Compression elbow sleeve, for any reason whatsoever, we'll refund you the full price NO QUESTIONS ASKED. So you can feel great knowing that you get to try it out completely risk FREE! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: steve sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Forearm and Elbow support
customer_reviews.text: Provides excellent support for elbow. I have tennis elbow, a short-term ailment that causes pain when I try to do anything too physical that involves the forearm or elbow. The compression sleeve allows me the freedom to engage in more vigorous outside work without causing pain. Make sure you get the size that fits tight on your elbow area. In my case that was a small (8" just above the elbow area). Their back support wrap support which I bought a few months ago also works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Roark C. Herron

customer_reviews.title: I tore my bicep muscle last winter shoveling heavy wet ...
customer_reviews.text: I tore my bicep muscle last winter shoveling heavy wet snow and doctors tell me that there are two bicep muscles and you do not need both. If I was a professional athlete they would fix it. It really was not designed to work with a torn bicep muscle, but I thought I would give it a try anyway. Every once in a while I get tennis elbow, but I have not had a chance to try it with the tennis elbow.
customer_reviews.author: crowlakeal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second compression sleeve from this company, this time for my left elbow. Not only has the compression sleeve helped me continue exercising reguarly despite an easily reinjured right elbow (I hyper extended it about 9 years ago), but when I purchased the first sleeve and got the size wrong, they sent me a new one free of charge without even requiring me to return the original. This is a fantastic produce and the company has incredible customer service to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Candice T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't run true to size chart
customer_reviews.text: I measured my arm and a size medium should have fit but was ridiculously small, like for a child's arm. Returned that and got a large and it was too tight around the elbow and the rest of the sleeve was loose and too big. Not much stretch or give to it either. Returning the large too. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeve Gives Great Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent compression sleeve. If you measure your bicep muscle accurately you will get the proper size for the sleeve. The sleeve will go up your arm, past your elbow and up your bicep muscle to give you not only comfort but the relief you hope to get from a compression sleeve. I have other sleeves and this is by far the best. I wholeheartedly recommend the Cooper Compression Recovery Elbow Sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Degennaro

customer_reviews.title: almost there
customer_reviews.text: I love the material this brace is made of. The only complaint I have is that the top band is so tight. It makes it very uncomfortable to where I can't wear it. I've ordered two of these braces and each one is the same way. The first was too tight so I ordered a larger one. It is also too tight and is the largest it comes. My arms are larger at the top but it just makes me wonder if one is muscular in the upper arm, it would be the same tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Got me back to the weights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleeve after I went too heavy on the bench and developed “tennis elbow.” Coupled with a trip to the doctor, this sleeve has gotten me back to lifting twice a week to go along with my other workouts. My advice for the sizing would be to order a size larger than you measure for. By the chart, I should use a large. But I had to re-order an XL when the large was fairly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pmost

customer_reviews.title: Way small than reported
customer_reviews.text: Sizing must be way off. I order a medium based on sizing chart and can not get this even up to my elbow. It works ok because I want it more for my forarm anyway but be warned it is super small. Minor details but the logo literally disentigrated just putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Believe in the power of the copper!!! I have had terrible tennis elbow pain and after purchasing the copper compression forearm strap, I wanted something more slimline and that I could wear under my workout gear. The copper compression sleeves are where it's at!! I wear them all day while at work and the pain has subsided tremendously. I cannot thank them enough for coming out with such a product! I will prob have to order another set because I will be wearing these out very very soon. They have retained the stretchy-ness very well and still feel comfortable even after a 12 hour day. I highly recommend this product if you have elbow pain.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This product was really great and I feel it definitely helped with the pain from the tendonitis in my right elbow. Unfortunately I only got to wear the sleeve for 4 days and then lost it on a business trip! Now that I have been without it for a couple of days I can feel the pain coming back and more intense! I will be purchasing a replacement right away! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that has tennis elbow / tendonitis. I have talked with others that wear Copper Compression gloves for their arthritis and they swear by them for easing the pain. Sizing seems to be accurate using the website guidelines and was comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Top part fits too tightly
customer_reviews.text: I *think* this is helping my tennis elbow, it does tend to feel better after wearing it. I wear it mostly when sleeping and can tell when I wake up that I have had it on and over the past 5-6 weeks I do notice slightly less pain. My only complaint is that it is VERY tight at the top, around my bicep and that is uncomfortable after a while. Honestly, this is the only problem I have when sleeping as this gets to be too uncomfortable and wakes me up. I wish the top fit as well as the rest of the sleeve and not so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Comes up Short
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised but the only problem is that the sizes run extremely small and have no stretch ability to fit over the body parts its intended for if you are an above average person. (i.e. 5'11" 190lbs and above). So you will have to order a larger size or 2 sizes up to get the best results from the product. The customer service representatives are great in helping you and always goes the extra mile to satisfy the customer shopping experience. I would order again based off their reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent compression
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I was disappointed with this item. I measured as instructed and the size fit fine and worked great for my elbow but the upper band was much too tight and felt like a tourniquet. I resorted to snipping it a bit to relieve that but it's still too tight after wearing for about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: RoBee

customer_reviews.title: Very good compression sleeve that wroks
customer_reviews.text: The bad: ot is way to long I think it needs to be 5" shorter than it is The good" it helps alive my elbow pain daily quickly. You move same as normal it dont really gender your movement, it dont slide ornslip away from where u place it. I use it almost everyday and it holds up to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Collins, AKA. Manator

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got larger arms, about 20 inches around upper arm & it fits fine. I wear it while exercising my arm, exercises are done to help with a nagging elbow injury. This product was recommended by a therapist, I was doubtful that something so lightweight could offer so much support, but I’m a believer now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Chisholm

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many elbow braces and sleeves and my biggest complaint is they never seem to fit the sizes they say either bigger or smaller. These were so small i couldnt get them over my elbow so I'm returning. Also note that you only get one sleeve for $16. Seem well made other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the M size, having followed sizing guidelines, but it was much too tight and left dark red rings on my arm. I emailed the supplier and they immediately mailed me the L size at no charge. The L fits really well and provides great pain relief. I've been using the product almost 2 months and the quality remains high. I was very impressed with the supplier's responsiveness and customer orientation.
customer_reviews.author: Diana J

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, because it works for me. I have bursitis in my left elbow (Popeye elbow). The doc said draining is the last option. He suggested a compression sleeve. I already owned the cheaper model from CopperFit, and decided to try this "quality one". I don't know if I'm benefitting from the copper or the compression, but I benefit! I wear it every day to work.
customer_reviews.author: Topper Movius

customer_reviews.title: Their website needs work
customer_reviews.text: The first elbow sleeve we got ripped at the seam within a couple weeks....when I tried to register it said my email was invalid so we could not register the product for warranty. This is the same gmail we have had for over 15 years????
customer_reviews.author: Leon B. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE THE HYPE: if you suffer from tennis elbow, these actual work.
customer_reviews.text: As a carpenter, I've struggled with tendonitis for several years now. I was tired of taking anti-inflammatories whose benefit was hardly noticeable. So I tried these compression sleeves. I LOVE THEM. Wearing them while at work, I very seldom notice the pain I had accepted as a part of life. Most days, I'm virtually pain free. I am seriously considering purchasing the lower back compression belt due to my belief in this product. Thanks to Copper Compression. Your product has considerably improved my life.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Strother

customer_reviews.title: I bought the xl and it fits perfect. I almost jumped in the shower with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Tennis elbow here any air that touches my elbow hurts. I am a plus size 1x in most things 2x in some. I was worried this would never fit and be way too tight. I bought the xl and it fits perfect. I almost jumped in the shower with it on forgetting it was there. It took a lot of pain away. I don't know about the how and why it works it just does.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Erin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Protect your joints.
customer_reviews.text: My elbow been aching a bit after constantly pushing myself at the gym. At first I thought I was just sore, but afte 2 weeks the ache was still there. My friend recommended using this. After wearing it, I noticed my ache wasn’t noticeable anymore. I was at ease. After 2 weeks of using this, I was back to normal. Even with no pain now, I still use it when i am planning on doing intense heavy arm workouts. I rather be safe than sorry with my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Tran

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These products are garbage and they should tell you where the product comes from before you buy it products too small material is rough
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My dad wanted this for elbow he broke 8 mos. ago. He likes that it’s a thin material and can easily wear under long sleeves. Also, great customer service. I measured my Dad’s elbow/arm and ordered Large, but it was too tight. Contacted customer service and they sent XL at no extra cost which was really nice. He knows it needs to be tight - the xl is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowstar98

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Boy do I like this! One day I had pain in my right elbow, at age 77 you have pain everywhere😩 I went to the internet and started to research a product that would help me. I found this copper sleeve and ordered it on Amazon. The result was amazing, good product, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Elbow Support
customer_reviews.text: After a work shoulder injury, my elbow was affected. I ordered a copper compression recovery elbow sleeve.my pain and discomfort in my elbow has gone away to a bare minimum. I have over time ordered 2 more copper compression elbow sleeves. My therapist infact said these copper compression elbow sleeves were the best and She recommends them highly to just about all her patients. I also highly recommend them to anyone with elbow joint pain or discomfort because of the relief I have gotten. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: artie Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I am a male, 6’2” and 200lbs. More slim than chunky... I was surprised that a “large” would barely go on. Unusable for me, I gave it to neighbor lady 5’4” & 145 lbs. She likes the fit. I’m thinking I might need XXL but unavailable. So, buy one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The compression it provides was OK, but the garments were terribly itchy to wear for any length of time. The logo itself came off within less than an hour. I tried to suck it up and deal with the skin irritation, because I really needed the benefit of the compression it provides. The first time I wore them I was able to deal with it for about 20 minutes. The second time I just couldn't deal with it. I know use them as tug toys for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Size change?
customer_reviews.text: Bought one a couple years ago and it helped me lately with pain on my inner elbow. I figured I should buy an extra on and have a rotation. The one they sent must've been in child sizes because it fit my 7 year old. I couldn't pull the smaller end past my hand. They both say medium on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Deterville

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: The elbow sleeve is great, but I need the next larger size. The company even offered a replacement with no additional charge, but I'd already requested a refund so I could buy the next size. Really great customer service. I got the knee sleeve, too, and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John Morrison

customer_reviews.title: I measured my arm 5" above my elbow joint and ...
customer_reviews.text: I measured my arm 5" above my elbow joint and it was 13.5" exactly. I went with the large and it's too tight. I'll try an XL next time. Edit: Copper Compression contacted me and resolved the issue.I have an XL and it works great. I really like the elastic band at the top compared to the Tommy Copper brand. If you lift weights and your measurement is borderline go for the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: G. Beer

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to wear and comfortable-helps with pain & range of motion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who suffers from elbow pain. These have been a great help to him. They are comfortable to wear and has helped with pain and movement. Recommend to anyone who has problems with elbow pain. I plan on purchasing 3 more, one for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Lasted leas than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the product at first. Fit well. Helped with pain. Unfortunately today the elastic part separated from the sleeve. I fear it will no longer function as needed. I will be seeking a replacement else where. The sleeve lasted less than 2 weeks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Warning: contains real magic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the whole copper craze pretty skeptical. Haven't done enough research to know if it's snake oil or not. That being said when I get in the gym and get tennis elbow from lifting weights. Like the debilitating tennis elbow that keeps you from working out. Ill put this bad boy on. And before I even realize it my elbow pain is completely gone. What kind of sorcery is this?
customer_reviews.author: Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: after only ONE DAY using the Copper Compression sleeve it feels so much better and I am able to use my arm without ...
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with tendonitis over the years and tried many different products to relieve the condition, after only ONE DAY using the Copper Compression sleeve it feels so much better and I am able to use my arm without the worry of reinjuring it. This product is amazing! It is comfortable enough to wear all day, everyday and I do! THANK YOU Copper Compression.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Glinick

customer_reviews.title: I continue to use the Elbow Sleeve hoping eventually all the pain will be gone for good in the biceps
customer_reviews.text: I have some relief which I welcome gladly. I continue to use the Elbow Sleeve hoping eventually all the pain will be gone for good in the biceps. I am grateful for any relief of the uncomfortable and extensive pain. I am so happy I am using both the elbow sleeve and the copper infused stockings. Bernita Williams
customer_reviews.author: Bernita Williams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic when it comes to buying health remedies. However, my tennis elbow pain has been so intense, I was willing to try any recommended solution. My Chiropractor recommended the copper compressions sleeves. I've worn them for less than 24 hrs, and the reduction in pain is incredible. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: clay hargis

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve works great for slight elbow pain due to tendinitis. After a lot of heavy lifting my joints would hurt and this worked great to wear under my uniform. It allowed full range of motion while having that compression to help reduce some of the joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halstead

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package.. excited to see results!! Instantly.. my pain was gone!! I was very skeptical... but hopeful! The product stays in place very well and feels like i have nothing on! You can even layer long sleeved clothes and have no effects that you have this on . Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you- I was in pain - golfer or tennis elbow - call it what you will. It HURT! My doctor recommended icing and massage, which I did, but I also thought this would be a great way to alleviate the pain that icing didn't touch. I wore it 3 weeks straight around the clock. The pain was gone! Now, I wear it at night as a preventative. My doc is now in agreement with me and also suggested wearing it when I work out. I don't know the science behind it - but all I know, it's nice to pick up my mug of coffee without any pain.
customer_reviews.author: dormik95

customer_reviews.title: Causes skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I measured my arm exactly ho they said. I was smack in the middle of the medium range. However it is so tight that it leaves lasting marks on my arm to the place that my massage therapist was very concerned. I have received some pain relief but cannot wear it all the time like I want to because of the skin irritation it causes.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Root

customer_reviews.title: Two different sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two sleeves for tendonitis in both my arms and to help with working out. When they arrived the two sleeves which I supposed were the same had completely different packaging, and one of them had visibly worn out graphics and felt more loose compared to the other one. I’m guessing someone wore it before it was sold to me or it’s a defective product. Either way right now I’m stuck with two sleeves I can’t wear because I don’t want uneven support
customer_reviews.author: Sercan Yildiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: Tendonitis in my elbow with pain radiating down my forearm. Within minutes of putting this sleeve on, the pain lessened, within the hour didn't even feel it. Fit is exact, so order as size chart says. Comfortable to wear, and breathes very well.
customer_reviews.author: KingKoolDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Hmm...
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this thinking it would help with some minor pain and discomfort. IMO there is noi evidence to support that, only the claims of people who think they are getting some value from either compression or the copper. Fit was an issue since these were purchased online and she thought it would fit without being very tight. However, it was very tight and she only wore it a few times before this made its way to a drawer with no further interest to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bruner

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I will fully admit that’s I was very skeptical about the benefits of copper to relieve the tendinitis in my elbow. But, my wife talked me into buying this sleeve and I was much improved after only a few days. It’s now been about out two weeks and I’m pretty much fully recovered and no longer need Advil to get through the day. I’m a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Markos S.

customer_reviews.title: Item looks like the picture but misrepresents
customer_reviews.text: Item looks like the picture but misrepresents . Does not fit as picture depicts and my arm is much smaller . Don't know what the copper is supposed to do if anything or how long to wear to feel affect. It's like wearing the bottom part of a leg from panty hose, which I adapted in the past. Does nothing for my bursa as advertised it would do. Have not used at gym yet but and sure if it will protect me.
customer_reviews.author: N Emery

customer_reviews.title: They work but I haven't noticed a difference with or without copper
customer_reviews.text: They really do cut down on pain and discomfort, Im able to actually sleep through the night and don't wake up with swollen arms. The first pic is the large much better fit especially around the bicep, the second pic is mediums which still help the pain but are very difficult to get on. I do wish the elastic lasted longer and the elastic bands tend to roll down which gets a bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: DaLar89

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I followed the whole measuring of the arm and stuff for size to order. It fit going on, but when I bent my arm it was really tight in the for arm and bicep and added more pain instead of soothing it. I returned it with no hassle. Might work for someone else but not for me. It was worth a try though. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

product_meta.title: Copper Compression Recovery Elbow Sleeve - Guaranteed Highest Copper Content Elbow Brace for Tendonitis, Golfers or Tennis Elbow, Arthritis. Elbow Support Arm Sleeves Fit for Men and Women (Large)
feature_bullets: HIGHEST COPPER CONTENT - Copper Compression products have the highest copper content. Guaranteed. Rather than spraying fabrics with copper, we infuse it directly into the nylon fibers. Our products are constructed with 85% copper-infused nylon. This innovative approach brings you maximum hygienic benefits, enhanced protection and a superior experience.

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE - In the very unlikely event that you do not absolutely Love this Copper Compression elbow support brace, for any reason whatsoever, we'll refund you the full price no questions asked. That's how confident we are that you'll be happy with this purchase.

HIGHEST COPPER CONTENT COMPRESSION ELBOW SLEEVE - Copper Compression Elbow Brace Wraps are designed to help you get the support you need for all day and all night comfort. Commonly used by people suffering from Golfers Elbow, Tennis Elbow, Arthritis, Tendonitis, Bursitis, Osteoporosis, and more!

KEEP YOUR ELBOWS, FOREARMS, AND UPPER ARMS COMPRESSED with our ultra comfortable fabric that gives you support while still allowing you to retain your range of motion. This is extremely important because by retaining your range of motion, your muscles can continue to work and strengthen.

HIGH PERFORMANCE + YOU CAN WEAR IT EVERYDAY - Copper Compression Padded Elbow Sleeves fit extremely comfortable and can be worn everyday to help you get the support you need! Perfect for any Tommie, Dick, or Harry. Our high quality fabric will also withstand washing and will not lose its function over the course of time like many other products!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
